name: Expansive Horizons
description:
A very simple space shooter game, based on games of old such as Space Invaders and Gradius. Take on the role of a pilot in a distant future, fleeing his military's base as an enemy attack hits it. Fight through the droves as your adversaries try to get past you at all costs.

Thanks to Flaming3z for doing the art! I kinda suck at it so... definitely looks better than it would have without him.

NOTE: The Mac and Linux builds of the game have not been tested. They were compiled with the default Unity build tools for each platform.
